1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: chksum.h Sun 11-19-2000 10:53:00 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | #ifndef __CHECK_SUM_H
6    | #define __CHECK_SUM_H
7    | 
8    | /*
9    |  * Until C compilers support C++ namespaces, we use this
10   |  * prefix for our namespace.
11   |  */
12   | #ifndef NAMESPACE
13   | #define NAMESPACE(x)    _w32_ ## x     
14   | #endif
15   | 
16   | #ifndef BYTE
17   | #define BYTE unsigned char
18   | #endif
19   | 
20   | #ifndef WORD
21   | #define WORD unsigned short
22   | #endif
23   | 
24   | #ifndef DWORD
25   | #define DWORD unsigned long
26   | #endif
27   | 
28   | #define inchksum      NAMESPACE (inchksum)
29   | #define inchksum_fast NAMESPACE (inchksum_fast)
30   | #define do_checksum   NAMESPACE (do_checksum)
31   | 
32   | extern WORD inchksum    (const void *ptr, int len);
33   | extern int  do_checksum (BYTE *buf, int proto, int len);
34   | 
35   | #ifndef cdecl
36   | #define cdecl  /* prevent register calls */
37   | #endif
38   | 
39   | /* chksum0.asm / chksum0.s
40   |  */
41   | extern WORD cdecl inchksum_fast (const void *ptr, int len); 
42   | 
43   | #if defined(USE_FAST_CKSUM)
44   |   #define checksum(p,len) inchksum_fast(p,len)
45   | #else
46   |   #define checksum(p,len) inchksum(p,len)
47   | #endif
48   | 
49   | #endif
